New Records: Shubman Gill scored an unbeaten 126, leading India to their biggest-ever total against New Zealand - 234.
India achieved their biggest margin of victory against New Zealand by 168 runs.
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill scored an unbeaten 126 runs.
Suryakumar Yadav played a small cameo.
Hardik Pandya took 4 wickets for 16 runs.
Arshdeep Singh, Shivam Mavi, and Umran Malik each took 2 wickets.
New Zealand was reduced to 21/5 in 4.3 overs.
New Zealand was bowled out for 66 runs in 12.1 overs.
